SystemTable.name: server_info
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists server_info ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `inst_type` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:master, 1:slave', `ip` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `port` int(11) NOT NULL, `htap_port` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'port for htap', `mgr_port` int(11) NOT NULL, `mpp_port` int(11) NOT NULL, `status` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:server ready, 1:server not_ready, 2:server removed', `region_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `azone_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `idc_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `cpu_core` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `mem_size` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `extras` text DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'reserve for extra info', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_inst_id_addr` (`inst_id`, `ip`, `port`), INDEX `idx_inst_id_status` (`inst_id`,`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: storage_info
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists storage_info ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `storage_inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `storage_master_inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `port` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'port for mysql', `xport` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'port for x-protocol', `user` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `passwd_enc` text NOT NULL, `storage_type` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:x-cluster, 1:mysql, 2:polardb', `inst_kind` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:master, 1:slave, 2:metadb', `status` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:storage ready, 1:storage not_ready, 2:storage removed', `region_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `azone_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `idc_id` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `max_conn` int(11) NOT NULL, `cpu_core` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `mem_size` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'mem unit: MB', `is_vip` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0: ip is not a vip, 1: ip is a vip', `extras` text DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'reserve for extra info', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX `idx_inst_id_status` (`inst_id`,`status`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_inst_id_addr` (`storage_inst_id`, `ip`, `port`,`inst_kind`, `is_vip`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: db_info
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists db_info ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `db_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `app_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `db_type` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:part_db,1:default_db,2:system_db,3:cdc_db,4:new_part_db', `db_status` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:running, 1:creating, 2:dropping', `charset` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `collation` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `read_write_status` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '0:read_write,1:read_only,2:write_only', `extra` text DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'extra info', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_db` (`db_name`), INDEX `idx_type` (`db_type`), INDEX `idx_app_name` (`app_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
SystemTable.Change: alter table `db_info` add column `read_write_status` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '0:read_write,1:read_only,2:write_only'
alter table `db_info` add column `extra` text default null COMMENT 'extra info'

SystemTable.name: db_group_info
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists db_group_info ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `db_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `group_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `phy_db_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `group_type` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:normal group, 1:scaleout group', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX `idx_db_type` (`db_name`, `group_type`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_db_grp` (`db_name`, `group_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: group_detail_info
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists group_detail_info ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `db_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `group_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `storage_inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_inst_db_grp` (`inst_id`, `db_name`, `group_name`), INDEX `idx_storage_inst` (`storage_inst_id`,`inst_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: config_listener
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists config_listener ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `data_id` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `status` int NOT NULL COMMENT '0:normal, 1:removed', `op_version` bigint NOT NULL, `extras` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX `idx_modify_ts` (`gmt_modified`), INDEX `idx_status` (`status`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_data_id` (`data_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: inst_config
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists inst_config ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `param_key` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `param_val` varchar(1024) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_inst_key` (`inst_id`, `param_key`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: inst_lock
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists inst_lock ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `locked` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '0:unlocked, 1:locked', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_inst_id` (`inst_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

SystemTable.name: variable_config
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists variable_config ( `id` bigint(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `inst_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `param_key` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `param_val` varchar(1024) NOT NULL, `extra` varchar(128), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_param_key` (`param_key`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
